name: oauth.client-id
description: Specifies the Client ID of the default OAuth client. Use query parameter `clientId` to use a different client.

name: oauth.redirect-uri
description: Specifies the default Redirect URI after login. Use query parameter `redirect` on login to use a different Redirect URI.

name: user.account-creation.require-email-verification
displayName: User Account Creation Require Email Verification
description: Specifies if email verification is required while signing up in the service. Also modify `user.account-creation.require-email-verification` in your backend config.

name: user.account-creation.enable-invite-only
displayName: User Account Creation Enable Invite Only
description: Specifies if accounts can be created only using an invite code. Also modify `user.account-creation.enable-invite-only` in your backend config.

name: privilege.can-create-account
description: Specifies if users can signup into the service. If false, users can be created using the bulk create api at `users/admin-api/create` or `users/client-api/create`. Also modify `privilege.can-create-account` in your backend config.

name: privilege.can-reset-password
description: Specifies if users can reset their passwords using forgot password option.

name: privilege.can-use-phone-number
displayName: Can Use Phone Number On Signing Up
description: Specifies if users can signup with phone numbers. Note that Liquid currently does not support verification of phone numbers. By default, all phone numbers are marked as unverified.  Also modify `privilege.can-use-phone-number` in your backend config.

name: privilege.can-use-existing-session-in-login
displayName: Can Use Existing Session In Login
description: Specifies if users can be directly sent to authorization if there is an existing session with the server.

name: assets.favicon-uri
description: Specifies the URL for the favicon.

name: assets.mini-icon-light
description: Specifies the URL for the icon in the top left of the screens.

name: assets.mini-icon-dark
description: Specifies the URL for the icon in the top left of the screens.

name: assets.header-icon-light
description: Specifies the URL for the icon that appears in the header of the screen.

name: assets.header-icon-dark
description: Specifies the URL for the icon that appears in the header of the screen.

name: assets.sidebar.backdrop-image-light
description: Specifies the URL for the sidebar background image.

name: assets.sidebar.backdrop-image-dark
description: Specifies the URL for the sidebar background image.

name: content.app-name
description: Specifies the name of the application.

name: content.app-tagline
description: Specifies the tagline of the application.

name: content.sidebar.enabled
description: Specifies the sidebar can be shown.

name: content.sidebar.content-enabled
description: Specifies the sidebar content can be shown.

name: content.sidebar.intro.title1
description: Specifies the content for Title 1 of the sidebar intro.

name: content.sidebar.intro.title2
description: Specifies the content for Title 2 of the sidebar intro.

name: content.terms-and-conditions-url
description: Specifies the URL for terms and conditions of your application.

name: content.privacy-policy-url
description: Specifies the URL for privacy policies of your application.

name: content.sidebar.intro.description
description: Specifies the content for Description of the sidebar intro.
default: Focus on writing your app logic while liquid handles the same old authentication logic ðŸ”’

name: form.input.can-display-placeholder
description: Specifies if input fields in forms can display placeholder.

name: theme.app-font-face
description: Specifies the Font Face to be used in static pages.

name: theme.app-font-url
description: Specifies the Font URL associated with the given Font Face to be used in static pages.

name: theme.app-font-base-size
description: Specifies the base Font size to be used in static pages.

name: theme.light.background-color
description: Specifies the page background color.

name: theme.light.primary-button.height
description: Specifies the height of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.color
description: Specifies the color of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.active-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Active Color (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the color of the submit button (when active) in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.text-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Text Color (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the text color of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.active-text-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Text Active Color (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the text color of the submit button (when active) in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.error-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Error Color (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the color of the submit button (during error) in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.error-text-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Text Error Color (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the color of the submit button (during error) in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.focus-box-shadow
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Box Shadow (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the value for box shadow property of the submit button (when focussed) in forms.

name: theme.light.primary-button.border-radius
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Border Radius (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the border radius of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.light.form.input-border-radius
displayName: Theme - Form Input Border Radius (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the border radius of the input fields in forms.

name: theme.light.form.input-use-border
displayName: Theme - Use Border in Form Input (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the borders can be used in input fields in forms.

name: theme.light.form.input-border-color
displayName: Theme - Form Input Border Color (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the border colors used in form input fields.

name: theme.light.form.input-vertical-padding
displayName: Theme - Form Input Vertical Padding (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the vertical padding of the input fields in forms.

name: theme.light.form.input-horizontal-padding
displayName: Theme - Form Input Horizontal Padding (Light Mode)
description: Specifies the horizontal padding of the input fields in forms.

name: theme.dark.background-color
description: Specifies the page background color.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.height
description: Specifies the height of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.color
description: Specifies the color of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.active-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Active Color (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the color of the submit button (when active) in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.text-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Text Color (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the text color of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.active-text-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Text Active Color (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the text color of the submit button (when active) in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.error-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Error Color (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the color of the submit button (during error) in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.error-text-color
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Text Error Color (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the color of the submit button (during error) in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.focus-box-shadow
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Box Shadow (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the value for box shadow property of the submit button (when focussed) in forms.

name: theme.dark.primary-button.border-radius
displayName: Theme - Primary Button Border Radius (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the border radius of the submit button in forms.

name: theme.dark.form.input-border-radius
displayName: Theme - Form Input Border Radius (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the border radius of the input fields in forms.

name: theme.dark.form.input-use-border
displayName: Theme - Use Border in Form Input (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the borders can be used in input fields in forms.

name: theme.dark.form.input-border-color
displayName: Theme - Form Input Border Color (Dark Mode)
description: Specifies the border colors used in form input fields.

displayName: Theme - Form Input Vertical Padding (Dark Mode)
